inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addSpellDamageBonus('Electrical', 'Stackable', 20); effect.getBonuses().addSpellDamageBonus('Fire', 'Stackable', 20); effect.getBonuses().addSpellDamageBonus('Cold', 'Stackable', 20); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Elemental Mastery
description: Your proficiency with Fire, Ice, and Lightning spells increases.  Your damage bonuses when casting those types of spells further increases to a total of 40%.
